articles.title: Residents of Punggol HDB block to be tested for Covid-19 after 8 cases detected - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Residents living in Block 325A Sumang Walk in Punggol will undergo mandatory Covid-19 tests after eight cases were found in three different households in the block. In an update on Monday night (June 7), the Ministry of Health (MOH) said it will b…

articles.title: Asian Qualifiers:Asian Qualifiers - Group E: India revive hopes with victory over Bangladesh - The Official Home of Asian Football
articles.description: Doha: India defeated Bangladesh 2-0 to revive their Asian Qualifiers for the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 and AFC Asian Cup China 2023 Group E campaign on Monday.
